name: Promise & Prophecy Demo
description:
Promise & Prophecy is a choice-heavy visual novel about a princess, who must journey to a faraway land and navigate the treacherous politics of an unfamiliar court to liberate her kingdom and reclaim her throne. Who can she trust, and who is only using her for their own ends?

Demo features:

  • Semi-customizable main character
  • Hand-painted watercolor backgrounds
  • Several choices which will impact the story going forward 
  • Three leaving-off points, from which the full game will resume
  • ~15,000 words

Setting:
The continent of Quellian is divided into six countries, but Latus has spent the last twenty years conquering its neighbors and growing into an empire, all in pursuit of the magical and rare Lifestone.
Helsten is Latus' neighbor to the north, and is home to both The Princess and the largest Lifestone mine in Quellian. Helsten's magic-wielding knights are a force to be reckoned with, but Latus has developed weapons that just might tip the scales of battle in their favor.
